channel.title: CVE Feed for Philip Hazel -- xfpt
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Philip Hazel -- xfpt

item.title: CVE-2024-43700|2024-08-29T13:07:02.051Z -- philip%20hazel -- xfpt
item.description: xfpt versions prior to 1.01 fails to handle appropriately some parameters inside the input data, resulting in a stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability. When a user of the affected product is tricked to process a specially crafted file, arbitrary code may be executed on the user's environment.

item.title: CVE-2024-43700|2024-08-29T07:36:13.470Z -- philip%20hazel -- xfpt
item.description: xfpt versions prior to 1.01 fails to handle appropriately some parameters inside the input data, resulting in a stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability.
